replies.body:
I am just mad because my mom came into my room to bring me a plate of chicken nuggets and I literally screamed at her and hit the plate of chicken nuggets out of her hand.

She started yelling and swearing at me and I slammed the door on her. I'm so distressed right now I don't know what to do. I didn't mean to do that to my mom but I'm literally in shock from listening to this song tonight. I feel like I'm going to explode. Why was this awful work in progress even made? This can't be happening. I'm having a damn breakdown.

I don't want to believe the world is so bad at music production. I want a future to believe in. I want Apollo2OP to fix the mainstream music scene, but this released. I cannot deal with this right now. It wasn't supposed to be like this, I thought drum & bass was a defunct genre???? This is so scary.
